General.Name: Barramundi Group Ltd
General.Description: Barramundi Group Ltd. farms, distributes, and sells sea water barramundi products. It operates ocean farms in Australia, Singapore, and Brunei. It provides chilled and frozen barramundi products in individual and multi-portion packs, as well as larger fillets or customized specifications for chefs and restaurants; smoked and specialty seafoods; and soups and sauces. The company also develops and sells autogenous vaccines for fishes; farms seabass; imports and trades in fishes; and engages in the general trade activities. It sells its products under the Kühlbarra, Cone Bay Ocean Barramundi, and St. John's Seabass. Barramundi Group Ltd. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Singapore.
